## Does percentage of type 2 muscle fibres affect performance in squat 3RM maximum load?

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(exscidata)
library(kableExtra)
library(dplyr)

data("hypertrophy") 

hypertrophy %>%
  
  select(PARTICIPANT, BODYMASS_T1, SQUAT_3RM) %>%
  
  ggplot(aes(BODYMASS_T1, SQUAT_3RM)) + geom_point(size = 3, fill = "lightblue", shape = 21) +
  
geom_smooth(method = "lm") 

reg<-lm(SQUAT_3RM ~ BODYMASS_T1, data = hypertrophy)

summary(reg)

plot(reg)
```
